    Citation

    Couturier D, Ryan L, Puhr R, Jaki T, Heritier S (2024). BATSS: Bayesian Adaptive Trial Simulator Software (BATSS) for Generalised Linear Models. R package version 1.0.0, https://batss-dev.github.io/BATSS/.
